#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int i,n,t,c,c2,c3,c5;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    cin>>n;
	    c2=c3=c5=0;
	    for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
	    {
	        c=i;
	        while(c%2==0)
	         {c2++;
	          c=c/2;
	         }
	         c=i;
	        while(c%3==0)
	         {
	             c3++;
	             c=c/3;
	         }      
	        while(c%5==0)
	        {
	         c5++;
	         c=c/5;
	        }
	    }
	    cout<<c2<<"\n"<<c3<<"\n"<<c5<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
